file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Aptos Node Checker
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: "http://localhost:20121/api"
tags: []
paths:
  /check_node:
    get:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/NodeUrl"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompleteEvaluation"
  /check_preconfigured_node:
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompleteEvaluation"
components:
  schemas:
    CompleteEvaluation:
      type: object
      required:
        - evaluations
        - summary_score
        - summary_explanation
      properties:
        evaluations:
          type: array
          description: All the evaluations we ran.
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Evaluation"
        summary_score:
          type: integer
          format: uint8
          description: An aggeregated summary (method TBA).
        summary_explanation:
          type: string
          description: An overall explanation of the results.
    Evaluation:
      type: object
      required:
        - headline
        - score
        - explanation
        - source
      properties:
        headline:
          type: string
          description: "Headline of the evaluation, e.g. \"Healthy!\" or \"Metrics missing!\"."
        score:
          type: integer
          format: uint8
          description: Score out of 100.
        explanation:
          type: string
          description: Explanation of the evaluation.
        source:
          type: string
          description: "Name of the evaluator where the evaluation came from, e.g. state_sync."
    NodeUrl:
      type: object
      required:
        - url
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          description: "Target URL. This should include a scheme (e.g. http://). If there is\nno scheme, we will prepend http://."
        metrics_port:
          type: integer
          format: uint16
          description: Metrics port.
          default: 9101
        api_port:
          type: integer
          format: uint16
          description: API port.
          default: 8080
        noise_port:
          type: integer
          format: uint16
          description: Validator communication port.
          default: 6180
      example:
        url: mynode.mysite.com
        metrics_port: 9101
        api_port: 8080
        noise_port: 6180
